page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
Leisure Facilities.
Although there are no theatres, cinemas, bingo halls or night clubs the two villages are relatively well served for leisure activities. There are two village halls and a sports pavilion where dances, bingo sessions and other social functions are held. Sporting activities include football, cricket, bowls, tennis, squash, badminton, snooker, small multi-gym and sauna. Many thriving societies exist; W.I. Henpeckers,Ballroom Dancing,Derby and Joan,Playgroup,Scouts,Cubs,Beavers, Guides,Brownies,Young Farmers and Youth Club. There are theatres at Boston and Lincoln and cinemas at Grantham, Boston and Lincoln.
